name: Cumulus - Together In The Clouds
description:
Our young Space Cowboy(Ben) was suddenly transported to a floating island above the clouds! It is now up to you to help him reach nearby islands and discover the mystery at hand!

This game was made in 48 hrs for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Joining Together"

The developers involved are:
Khevan - 3D Art, Game Design
Joe - Programming
SolarEclipse (Surya) - Programming, Game Design
NeroGames - 2D Art, Programming
Musicka - Sound Design (Music & SFX)

To contact the developers, you can reach out to:
Khevan - khevan.thanki@gmail.com
Joe - joebalanoff@gmail.com
SolarEclipse (Surya) - suryanaren@gmail.com
